    • Method Detail

      • load

        <U,I> PreferenceFM load(InputStream in,
                        FastUserIndex<U> users,
                        FastItemIndex<I> items)
                 throws IOException
        Loads a factorisation machine from an input stream.
        Type Parameters:
        U - type of users
        I - type of items
        Parameters:
        in - input stream
        users - user index
        items - item index
        Returns:
        factorisation machine for recommendation tasks
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O problems

      • save

        <U,I> void save(PreferenceFM fm,
                OutputStream out)
         throws IOException
        Saves a factorisation machine in an output stream.
        Type Parameters:
        U - user type
        I - item type
        Parameters:
        fm - factorisation machine for recommendation tasks
        out - output stream where the factorisation machine is written
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O problems
